content.detailedDescription:
I know i am filing an old report but it is one of the best ufo sightings that i have seen. 

one august night in the summer of 2001 some friends and i decided to take a walk to the local beach to watch the annual meteor shower. we had been laying on the sand for about 30 minutes or so when i decided to sit up and adjust the pillow i was using, upon looking across the lake i noticed a oval shaped ball of orange hovering just above the tree line, i then informed my friends saying "hey look what the hell is that?" we all sat up and watched as this ball of orange hung above the trees in the distance. after about 5 minutes or so of watching and trying to guess what it was it got bigger and that's when we realized holy crap this ufo was making its way over the lake towards us.

   at the site of this new direction the ufo was taking we all stood up and gathered our things, waiting to see what would happen. it slowly drifted towards us which seemed about 5 minutes to cross the lake and positioned itself about 15 meters from the shore line of the beach. it was bigger now, went from about a pea size in the distance to an egg sized oval closer to the beach. the ufo color was different too it was now changing numerous colors, had a metallic luster to it and appeared to be spinning. by this time i was in a panic state of mind as it was not my first ufo and i was already well versed in ufo sightings and abduction stories. so we moved a little bit up the beach just about 2-3 meters and by this time my friend decided it would be a good idea to flash our high powered flashlight at it, so she stood there aiming a very bright beam of light at it. this made me even more paranoid of the consequences of trying to make contact with a ufo i was yelling at her "shut off the light its moving closer" and it was moving closer as we kept backing away, though it appeared close enough to shine a light upon our flashlight didn't get reflected off it's surface.

   another few minutes went by when we noticed that this ufo was emitting white light into the water, we could see flashes in the water reflection and beams streaming down from the vessel and that's about the time we started to hear a strange sound. the other friend of mine says "look shut up dani and listen can't u hear it, it's making techno noises!" we all went quiet and sure enough this ufo was emitting a whirring pulsating sound, "neeerroo neeerroo neerroo" over and over again that's all we could hear and it got louder too as it came closer to the shore line. this was my breaking point i was freaking out and my friends wanted to stay, but i managed to convince them to leave so we ran into a yard about 10 meters up the beach then to the street in front of the yard where we stopped under a street lamp to catch our breath. when suddenly a really loud huge plane flew over the house and over us. my friend then said "oh my god it morphed into a plane" and i believe it did for the following reasons size, light color and lack of insignia. this plane was too big for northern saskatchewan as we do not live near any major airports, our airports are only functional for small planes such as air ambulance. the three lights underneath were only white and were in a line under the middle of the plane, and there was no visible markings on it. further more why would a plane that size fly so low when the airport is about 2 miles from where we were. 

   my most impressive sighting to date and this happened the summer i turned 16, i still think about what would have happened but i am very glad that we did not make the abduction list!
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Oval shapped fire ball hovering over tree line across a lake then slowly hovering towards my friends and i. hovering almost above us making noise then morphing into a plane.

content.detailedDescription: I went to look out back door for possible snowfall as reported to be possible tonight.  i saw the object in the sky coming from the west and moving steadily toward the east.  i proceeded to the front of the house where i saw it continuing east.  i asked my wife to come look, and she commented on it as well.  it continued travelling in an easterly direction, but i lost track of it as it was too cold to stand outside w/o shoes on.  during the entire experience, there was no noise from the object observed, or from anywhere else since we live near edge of a very small town that "goes to bed" pretty early at night.
content.summary: Looked out west side of house for snow, saw object in sky moving eastward - went to east side of house and saw again moving away

content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple red lights with no sound and strange movements like nothing ever seen, came in a pack then scattered

content.detailedDescription: On the way to a new year's eve party, a ufo descended to get closer to our car on e. commerce way approaching del paso road. was about to pull over but parties in the car declined that idea. i was excited to see the ufo and disappointed we couldn't pull over. when we drove away i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Descending ufo

content.detailedDescription: It was bright and landed
content.summary: Bright

content.detailedDescription: We are at cuernava. morelos. we were having dinner when my neighbor saw this light that seemed bigger than a plane and moving faster. he was just looking at the sky to see if he could see any stars and he noticed the red light moving. at first we thought it was an airplane. the light was at first moving fast and suddenly stopped for a few seconds and then just kept moving, clearly visible. some of us were excited to see this thing but my uncle was actually scared, we tried to filmed it but we think that it isn't able to see because of the distance. the object flew upwards after gaining altitude and kept moving until it was out of sight.
content.summary: We saw a red-orange circular light moving faster than a plane and suddenly stoped and after 30 secs started moving again.

content.detailedDescription: The brunswick news had an article on the front page thurs morn that an object was spotted in north fla over the island heading north! it was seen by many people from fl to st simons island where it finally made a turn and went down into the marsh! coast guard and civil air patrol went but couldn't find anything! witnesses said when it went down there was an explosion! like an airplane! air traffic said there was no traffic in that area at the time of the incident! law enforcement officials saw the object as well as many others! they said it must hav been a meteorite! only problem with that is it wasn't traveling very fast and witnesses said it had blinking light on the tail! i didn't see it but it sounds like somthing fidget! why didn't they find anything? it was traveling horizontal for 50 miles or who knows and when it got over st simons isl it turned and went down in a area where there's miles of marsh and creeks!  i don't know what it was but it was unidentified! that's for sure! call camden co georgia sherrifs off n ga! their deputies watched it according to the newspaper! so did people from n fl to st simons isl ga!  sounded pretty interesting to me!   i beleive this is the year we will get some real answers to the big question! a little alien told me that! lol!
content.summary: The object was spotted in n fl and was observed until it crashed 50 miles away around st simons island ga

content.detailedDescription: My mother, sister, and myself were returning home from grocery shopping when we stopped at the top of a hill and noticed lights in the sky. they were orangy red in color, but seemed to shift or pulsate to more red or more yellow as we watched them. we spotted 4 originally, and then a fifth light further away. we thought maybe they were airplanes, but they did not blink like planes do and they did not seem to be moving in any obvious direction. they seemed to "wander" around the portion of sky they were in, never movie very far from each other but definitely changing places and moving around. my sister and i tried to keep an eye on them as we drove home, but they seemed to disappear one by one. we finally lost the last one behind the trees. it was a very odd experience as none of us could seem to identify the lights. they didn't even really look like helicopters. it was really weird. having seen the darkest hour earlier didn't help.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red/orange/yellow lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i saw this on christmas eve as we were sitting in a parking lot. the location was in kingsport, tn approximately 8:50 pm 12/24/11. we saw the bright orange light path twice and recorded it the second time. (i zoomed in so the video really doesnt show perception clearly.) it followed the same path both times and quickly disappeared both times. it started low in the sky and traveled upwards and abruptly disappeared. it followed the same path twice. after watching the video, it shows it changing colors. there could be an explanation of what this is, but we couldnt come up with one. any suggestions?
content.summary: Bright orange light traveling through sky then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
An account from two professional mature people, well up the socio economic ladder

my wife and i were on our back deck while i had a smoke between 9:30 and 10pm monday the 9th of january. the sky was cloudless and the moon bright, but from above to the west the sky was dark and star filled, as the moon was far east.  i had my celestron spotter bi nocs out acclimizing as it was very crisp and cold that night, but with no wind and no clouds.  it was cold crisp and clear, and i could hear trans continentals 30 miles away to the south.  my wife pointed out a bright light almost due west. i trained on this light with binoculars.  and could see a craft i just assumed was a helicopter. i saw a red light on one side and a green light on the other, a bright white light to give the definition of triangle, and a dimmer white led'ish strobe light from within the center. other than the strobe light the others seemed absurdly bright, yet not blinding.  the (what i assumed was a helicopter rotated 360* without an iota of deviation up and down, or side to side). i was zoomed in considerably, lateral movement would have been obvious.  when it stopped rotating, pointed our direction was a bright light, but not spot light, just very bright.  this was soon obviously the nose of the craft, as it headed directly to our location and directly above us on our back step. about 450 to 500 feet. (i later confirmed the altitude, by measuring the focus of my binoculars to a duck blind down my river, approximately 550 to 600 feet. the duck blind was in focus and i had not adjusted my scope since the incident.  
as mentioned before we could hear liners far south barely visible.  this object in the 4 minutes of transit was absolutely quiet. almost eerily so, that we did not discern even the road traffic ourselves or in recording.  as it approached i saw a triangular black craft kinda like a stealth bomber, wings from nose but straight across tail from wing tip to wingtip (triangular).  its lights were ridiculously bright but did not seem to emit light (hard to describe)  as it was directly above us we could see its belly.  my wife plain sight and myself still with binocs. the craft was moving no more than 30 km's per hour. and suddenly we both could see (as i had to drop the binocs because of brightness) the entire craft except its very tips with the lights. transformed into the whitest and most perfectly spherical ball of white light, it was perfectly round and whitish blue, and only the tips of the craft were protruding. despite the blinding whiteness of this orb, strangely, the colored lights were also very noticeable.  the bright sphere went out.  and the craft flashed three pink lights nose to tail (down the center) and then instantly two lights inside the colored lights of the wings but out from center of the rear light that flashed in the 3 sequence.  and then it carried on, to the east. and stopping about a half mile from me, as it went over the rise to see the town of cornwall.  it seemed to consciously skirt the town and just do the circumfrence and come back.  we watched this cycle 3 times and then it went north and we never saw it again.  total time within 1000 feet was about 5 minutes.  beyond 1000 feet about an hour.  we have video from a crappy iphone.  but wouldnt you know, it only recorded when the thing was beyond a quarter mile, but did record sound and grey screen the entire time it was over us.  you can hear us discuss its soundlessness, the fact we can hear further objects, but for video only grey screen.  id be interested if anyone else saw it. the wife and i kinda asked around without sounding crazy.  and no one we talked to saw anything.  the papers and google search has shown nothing from anyone else either.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw a triangle shaped plane that defied physics

content.detailedDescription: I have been studying these objects since dec. 2010. this is the first real evidence showing that there really is life out there.
content.summary: My ufo study - star like object

content.detailedDescription:
this occurred almost 2 years ago but i just found out about this webpage today and feel that this is something significant and needs to be shared. it was about 12:15am at my mom's house in may of 2010. me being the night owl that i am was up reading and then went out in the backyard to have a cigarette. my mom's backyard had a kid's playset/treehouse from the previous owners that was made of a wood base with plastic climbing "rocks" to get up into the treehouse. it overlooked a nice sized pond which the rock steps were facing where i loved to sit on at night and gaze out at the sky. it was a beautiful clear night with bright stars, no breeze, no clouds and just the right temperature to enjoy myself in. so there i was in deep thought enjoying by now my second cigarette. i was about halfway through with it and had been sitting there for about 10 minutes now when for no reason known to me, i took my eyes off of the sky and looked over at my neighbor's tall, bushy tree. about 2 seconds after focusing my attention on the tree, a floating, cloaked being emerged. it was completely black with a hood and it covered everything from it's arms to it's feet. it's body was just like a human from what i could see (imagine a person in a grim reaper costume floating in the air). i was watching it from a side angle so i never saw a face, and also couldn't see a hand, or foot; it was fully cloaked. i would guess it to be 5.5 ft., but it's hard to say since i was watching it from the ground and it was in the air. it moved from the tree at a steady rate of maybe 2mph and kept the same height as the mid-length of the tree which it came from until it neared the edge of the pond; there, it descended while maintaining the same speed until it was about 15 feet above the pond and about 50 feet from the edge. there it stopped movement, pixelated away and was gone. i say pixelated because it didn't just disappear. it was like the pixels on a tv set one by one going away so that i could still see it gradually disappearing. and that was it. i sat there for a few seconds kind of in awe but i didn't have a lot of emotion. i had the same blank feeling as i watched it too. i wasn't scared, i wasn't excited either. i just watched it without any thought. i got up, threw down my cigarette, went inside and called my boyfriend. he got pretty excited as i told him and asked all sorts of questions. it wasn't until then i got a little frightened being the only one awake in the house. i stayed on the phone for a while and wouldn't go back outside that night and for a couple of weeks afterwards (unless someone was with me). i haven't seen it since.
 the strange thing i have to add here is that when i was in 9th grade living in nc, i went through a nerve-wrecking experience that continued for about 30 days where there was something in my room at night (maybe 12 out of the 30 days) when i'd go to bed. my room was upstairs and like it's own suite with a full bed, bath, living area, workout room, etc. that i had all to myself. it had 4 skylights, 2 in each main room. soon after turning out the lights, there would be a hooded being exactly like the one i'm mentioning now that would settle around the corner of my bedroom. so, i couldn't see it directly, but i knew it's precise location, movement, and figure (a black, cloaked being) as if i could see through the wall but i wasn't "looking" through the wall...It's hard to explain. it knew i knew it was there too. it seemed to communicate telepathically but it wouldn't let me know what it was thinking and it knew that i knew that, if that makes any sense. it seemed to just be observing me. i would get so frightened after a few minutes that i would "fly" out of bed and down the stairs. i'd wake my parents often but they could only try to comfort me and say it's my imagination and i spent many nights sleeping on the living room couch. that month or so effected my sleep to a point that i missed some school from being too tired resulting in my parents' concern for my well-being. they took me in to talk to a therapist. the therapist diagnosed me with depression and said my experiences were hallucinations due to lack of sleep...That was bologna...The sightings came before the lack of sleep! but being a doctor straight from the books there was no convincing her otherwise and she put me on an antidepressant only to find that it induced depression (never before had i ever experienced depression) so i stopped taking the meds and regained my former healthy mind. ten years later one can only wonder, due to the similarities, that these two incidences are in some way connected.
content.summary: Cloaked being floated out of tree for about 50ft., stopped above water and pixelated away.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were having a bon-fire when i looked up at the sky as i often do when i saw two clouds that should have been linked together and thought that was strange.  hen a mist/light shined down in a cone shape and i begged my husband to look up "for the love of god look up" i said.  he saw it too and was amazed.  2 minutes of looking at this light and it disappeared as quickly as it came.  i couldn't shake the feeling something/one was behind me.  my dog wouldn't stop looking into the woods.  i was scared.  the following week i had a dream or what i thought was a dream, it was the cloud in reverse.  i awoke at the back door looking up.  i closed the door and locked it thinking i was safe.  a year later i feel something on my neck, it feels like dried skin, i pick at it for days until i finally get twezzers and pull.  something, white plastic about 1/2 inch long, cone shaped, comes out of my neck!  before i can look at it close, i drop it on the floor never to be seen again.  i believe, i've always believed.  i just believed that it would happen to other people, not me.  so much for that.
content.summary: Cone shaped cloud/mist coming from sky where there should have been clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was right around the corner from my house at a little market when i first spotted this object. it looked like it was barely moving and lower than where a plane would be. i jumped in my car and drove home fast, ran in grabbed my camera and yelled to my husband hurry come look at this.

it made no sound what so ever, it looked very white and cigar shaped, when i first spotted the object it was flying much lower and extremely slow if at all, then it went straight up, and continued to move slow (enough time for me to capture this video) and then took off in about 2 sec across the sky out of my vision. later on we heard what sounded like a jet or 2 heading in that direction. sorry it's a bit shaky i was excited and also i couldn't see the object on the camera screen so i used the tree branches as a reference. just lucky i caught it at all! very excited about this!

i did get overly excited and tried to switch the camera to picture mode because i wasn't sure it was able to capture it in video mode (i could not see the object on my screen) and i just wanted some sort of proof. the pictures didn't come out that great it looks like a long dot even though i was zoomed in all the way, plus this thing was gaining speed and poof it was gone!
content.summary: Ufo jan. 14, 2012 3:41 pm in tn.

content.detailedDescription: @ approx 6:00 pm tonight (est), i was sitting on my parents couch looking out the huge picture window they have in the living room, the window faces roughly west-north/west, i saw a bright white light traverse from south to north at a high altitude and at tremendous speed. it did not appear to be a shooting star as there was no tell tale trail of debris falling off, there was no tail at all. just a bright white light travelling really, really fast
content.summary: Saw a really fast moving starlike sphere traverse sky in a south to north direction at high altitude

content.detailedDescription: Was lead into matilija canyon to were i found a spot to park there i saw a bright oarnge orb a realy big one fly over head past me then strate over to a mountian. then it droped out of the sky. strate down. but befor it disaperd behind the mountian it slowed down then gone. its the same mountian that iv seen many times ships comeing and going from there.          a month ago i saw giant clods comeing from the north heading south. must have been a mile or two long all in a row going realy fast disapire at that same mountian. i never seen that befor                    i realy dont know what to do any more its like im a berdun to them like im spying on them and they dont like it any more after what i saw in matilija canyon last night i suddunly got realy sick infact every time i see them lately i ended up in the hostpital over cristmas and new years for bleeding and they cant find the cause of why but new years was in i,c,u for two days. i think its when i see them i loose track of time then get realy sick and bleed in side. i realy wanted to get abducted to have them take me. i dont understand why they havent i gess
content.summary: In the mountians looking for gold right befor dark ben led to go deeper into the mountians

content.detailedDescription: I was at home checking e-mail.  the north window was to my left and something bright caught my eye.  i turned to look and saw the bright orange/pink light moving toward the north.  i stood up and leaned toward the window to get a better look.  the brightness, color and shape never changed.  i knew it was not an airplane at that point.  it moved in a deliberate direction from south to north.  i first saw it at about 45* above the horizon and it vanished less than 45 seconds later at 20* or less above the horizon.  it was not blocked by anything.  it just simply vanished suddenly.  i was confused at first and then, i was more or less stunned.  i had never seen anything that looked like this before.  i remained confused and awed by this even after it was gone from sight.  the object just vanished very abruptly.
content.summary: Viewed from north window.  moving north slowly.  very bright, dark orange/pink.  defined circular shape.  vanished instantly.

content.detailedDescription: This was a red object in the sky that was next to the moon at the start and went in a circular path around me. it the was followed by a moonstone colored object with the same physical properties and behavior.
content.summary: A red ball near the moon

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my dog for a walk and to feed stray dogs in my neighborhood. 
as i left the my apartment building (witch is facing south), i heard the sound of an aircraft above me. when i raised my eyes, i saw two commercial aircrafts in my visual sight. i kept walking and after 30 second i raised my eyes again on the sky to see the aircrafts. i saw the aircraft far away but also i spotted, to the southeast, very high in the sky, a white spherical object .When i first noticed the object i was thinking to planet jupiter. the object was moving, it looked like floating up and down with a white dull color. i grabbed my camcorder from my pocket (i have the camcorder along with me all the time) and started to record. when i was recording the object, it started to move very slowly to the right losing it several times in the clouds. after five minutes of recording i got the mesage from my camcorder to replace battery, and soon after, died. i took my dog and we run home to get my binocular and to power up my camcorder. in five minutes i was on my balcony with my camera conectedto charger. object was still there in the sky right in front of my balcony moving slowly to the right. sun had set and the object started now to glow, looking like a flying star ... on my balcony, as i set my camcorder on the tripod, i took my binocular. in binocular the objects looked like a glowing white dot. soon , object stopped and stood there in the sky like a bright star. some nasty clouds came and covered the star like object ! 
i have my record uploaded here : [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
and i submit 3 parts of my original record.
content.summary: Orb like ufo in daylight

content.detailedDescription: Looks to be a containment silo of some sort for a missile or shuttle.  you can see the center sphere and 3 smaller ones surrounding it.  1 sphere at 12:00 and the other 2 spheres are at 5:00 and 7:00
content.summary: Containment silo located on the moon...Missile? shuttle?

content.summary: Strange large lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Just filming a contrail while waiting for a friend. didnt see the orb until the video was played back. what is it?
content.summary: Filming aircraft contrail, only saw ufo during playback

content.detailedDescription:
Reporting from west akron ohio. event occured at 9:15pm on january 13, 2012. it is completely overcast here and there is a very low cloud ceiling this evening. i was in my mothers home and saw out of her window facing east an unusual colored orange ball in the sky about a hundred feet up and in front of her home. i dashed out the door to get a better look and saw the orange ball in the sky on a steady path, blinking. it took off to the north/ northeast and followed a steady path.

as i was watching the orange blinking light in the sky, about fifty feet in front of me and coming out from the middle of two condominium buildings, an orange orb came into view, about six to ten feet off the ground. travelling at about twenty miles per hour. it went up into the sky when it reached the edge (about fifteen feet away) of a garage and took what looked like a path behind the first ball. it did not blink but when it got up in the sky, i would say at about a thousand feet, it let off a small star from its right side. it had a white glow around it and an orange color inside. they ascended over portage country club.

both objects, for a moment, were visable together on the same path then disappeared into the cloud cover.

i was quite close to the second orb, about fifty feet away.

the combined sightings lasted approximately three minutes.

i am a lifelong ufologist.
content.summary: I saw an orange light out of the window...Went outside to see a blinking orange light in the sky and saw an orange orb come from between two buildings fifty feet away just above ground level , and rise into the sky behind the orange light

content.detailedDescription: Plane with flames or sparks seprated in two floated to ground when plane came back
content.summary: Nashville strange fire lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation (skiing) in sugarbush vt, staying in a rental house with my friends family.  it was new years eve, around 8pm, i was in the back yard operating the grill. the location overlooks the front side of the resort, it was overcast and visibility was poor (less than 2 miles) and it was precipitating (mixed conditions) lightly. 

the mountain was within view and i had just observed the test-fire for the fireworks display.  approximately 10 minutes later i had noticed a dimly lit orb slowly moving west to east, it was partly abstracted by trees.  i knew it was not an airplane due to the terrain and weather conditions... despite the direction it came from, i had assumed it was a lantern at this point and tended to the grill.   

about 30 seconds later i had turned around to see if it was still there... it was.  at this point it was hovering approximately 5-800ft above spring fling road and inferno road (or what seemed to be that area from my perspective). it seemed to gain altitude briefly, then descend perhaps 10-20 ft and again hover.  at this point it had my full attention.   

it was not very exciting to be honest.   it moved west slowly, then stopped again, hovered briefly and started moving east.   at this point it appeared to move away from me and slowly faded into the weather.  the entire time the object was glowing orange (at timed it was fairly bright) and very slowly pulsated from the red wavelength through the yellow wavelength. no nav lights or anything indicative of conventional aircraft. 

i would estimate the size of the object to be no more then 10ft in diameter. 

during the event, the object was partly obstructed by trees, as it became obscured i had to move my position slightly to regain visual.  i did this little dance till it faded into the weather. 

to give you an idea of the visibility that night... if you look at google maps, the address was between 163 and 331 sugarbush village rd (not sure, but i can point out the house).  from my location i could just barely see the highest point of inferno road that was possible from where i was standing... anything further was clouds/fog, cloud density was varying so visibility was not equal in all directions (typical weather in mountainous terrain)if i was flying, i would be flying ifr. 

no witnesses.  i didn't even tell my friends.

i have seen a ufo before (when i was a kid) but this was absolutely nothing like that event. 

best regards,

igor fokeev

ps: you guys are doing a great service and i would like to thank you for all of your hard work.
content.summary: Saw an orb moving slowly then stop... it appeared to slowly pulsate red/orange.

content.detailedDescription:
A little after 8:30 p.M. on january 1st, 2012 i was looking out my window, watching fireworks. i noticed a strange object in the sky. at first i thought it was a balloon with a light or fire in it because of how it was moving. then it struck me that no balloon could have a fire in it as this one seemed to have.

it was a steady, yellow light with a reddish corona around it. it had a red corona around it. from my view, it passed behind some tree branches, so the corona was likely enhanced by those, but the corona was present before it moved behind the tree. it moved from east to west in the sky and seemed to be in the direction of fort gordon, though i do not believe it was far enough away to be over the base.

i looked around to see if anyone was near me who could also see it, but no one was outside at the moment. it suddenly picked up with incredible speed and moved out of line of sight because my roof was in the way. i went out back of my condo to see if i could view it anymore and the object was gone.

it did not move in a straight line, but more like a balloon in the wind or like a dragonfly's flight path. it was erratic and jumpy, though always moved in the same general direction, east to west.

the object did not move like any man made aircraft.
content.summary: I thought it was a balloon at first, it was very high in the sky and moved erratically.

content.detailedDescription:
On a friday night in the fall of 1964, the witness, a spanish teacher at zapata high school, left the school shortly after midnight following a football game. as he was responsible for handling the funds generated by the concession stands, he remained at the school counting money until around midnight. traveling in his 1990 ram charger truck, the teacher drove south-southeast along u.S. highway 83, headed toward an rv park where he lived, located about 30 miles from the high school.

he had driven approximately 17 miles and was near coordinates 26.755153, -99.113982, about 3 miles north of lopeno, texas. the time was approximately 1 a.M. in his rear view mirror, he noticed a bright light swooping down out of the sky and moving toward his vehicle. the object looked like a slightly curved row of bright, multicolored flashing lights - and "sparks of light" or fire were emanating from underneath the object as it moved toward his position.

the witness' first thought was that it was an airplane in distress, and that it was going to crash into him. he slowed his vehicle down to around 50 mph. he noticed 3 or 4 other vehicles zoom past him as if in haste to leave the area. in moments, the object was rapidly approaching his truck. frightened, the witness came to a full stop and turned his engine off, at which point the object also stopped and hovered about 10 feet directly above the hood of the truck, where it remained for approximately 30 seconds.

during this time, the witness said he saw a slightly-curved row of approximately ten large lights, evenly spaced, each perhaps 24 inches in diameter. the lights were very bright and were blinking on and off in a regular pattern. the predominant colors were orange, blue, and white. the bright lights made it difficult to see the shape of the rest of the object, which was indistinct. there were no other surface characteristics and there was absolutely no sound.

the witness was extremely scared and nervous, but after the object hovered above his hood for about 30 seconds, it suddenly zoomed straight up into the sky and was gone in a second. the speed at which it moved was extremely fast.

the witness found no physical traces on his vehicle or person, and suffered no ill effects other than momentary fear. he observed no electromagnetic anomalies. there were no other witnesses.

the witness traveled this same route every work day until 1997 and never had any other sightings. he told nobody about it, except for his wife, because he was afraid of being ridiculed.
content.summary: 18-ft.-diameter object with semi-circular arrangement of blinking lights swooped down, followed truck, and hovered 10 feet above hood.
